dmca.title: Unauthorized Solicitation and Sale of Instructor's Solutions Manuals
dmca.body:
THOMSON

Thomson Learning
27500 Drake Road
Farmington Hills, MI 48331
Tel: 800-877-4253 Fax 246-699-8074
www.thomsonrights.com

VIA FACSIMILE

May 24, 2007
Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043
Fax: (650) 963-3255

RE: Unauthorized Solicitation and Sale of Instructor's Solutions Manuals

Dear Sir or Madam:

It has recently come to our attention that participants of Google Groups are using your service to solicit and/or exchange of Instructor's Solutions Manuals published by Thomson Learning ("Thomson").

Instructor Solutions Manuals published by Thomson are licensed for use by teachers and may not be copied, reproduced, sold or redistributed in any manner. Sales of such material are not only a breach of a clear contractual understanding, sales of Instructor Solutions Manuals infringe on the rights of Thomson Learning as both copyright and trademark owner.

I hereby certify that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of Thomson Learning and that I have a good faith belief that the listing(s) identified below offer items or contain materials that are not authorized by Thomson and therefore infringe Thomson's rights according to state, federal, or United States law.

Please act expeditiously to remove the listings identified in the addendum below

Sincerely,

Jessica Stitt
Infringement & Anti-Piracy Paralegal
Thomson Learning Global Asset Management
27500 Drake Road, Farmington Hill, MI 48331
Phone: 248-699-8027 Fax: 248-699-8074
E-Mail: jessica.stitt@thomson.com

Appendix
Listing(s)
http://groups.google.com/group/alt.math.undergrad/browse_thread/thread/e630811d821d0b0c/413dcf12at93817a

http://groups.google.com/group/set.math/browse_thread/thread/75f888314d87a9cd/a9da4be4c7c1c081

http://groups.google.co.bw/group/sci.math/browse_thread/thread/f5230bffat1049f1/b80d0a7e8a792
